snippet: The morning after the Israeli Air Force shot down an unidentified drone, the Lebanese government said that four Israeli warplanes spent an hour illegally circling in its airspace.
abstract: Lebanon claims Israeli warplanes spent an hour illegally circling its airspace one day after the Israeli Air Force shot down an unidentified drone in the Negev Desert.

byline.contributor: Fares Akram contributed reporting from Gaza City, and Hwaida Saad from Beirut, Lebanon.

lead_paragraph: The morning after the Israeli Air Force shot down an unidentified drone, the Lebanese government said that four Israeli warplanes spent an hour illegally circling in its airspace.

headline.main: Lebanon Says Israeli Planes Circled Its Airspace for an Hour
headline.print_headline: Lebanon Says Israeli Planes Circled Its Airspace for an Hour
